title: I want to complain about restricting my account by low priority queue. I have reasonable reason.
body: when I started the ranked game, I chose the champion and we started game normally. But after counting, there is only black window.... I didn't use any hacking program and I didn't intend to leave that game. I couldn't play game because of uncertain bug.... you can check my log . So, I want to ask administrator to recover my account. Actually, sometimes, I had this same situation. And, I searched problem, and then most people said the reason was that someone might have used hacking program.

replies.body: Even if your dodge or leave isn't intentional, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats it like anyone else because it still causes others a bad experience.  The black screen you've having is likely caused by a connection problem struggling to reach the game server.  We cannot remove your leaverbuster, but I recommend stick to customs for now and using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.
